name: CVE-2021-43980
description: The simplified implementation of blocking reads and writes introduced in Tomcat 10 and back-ported to Tomcat 9.0.47 onwards exposed a long standing (but extremely hard to trigger) concurrency bug in Apache Tomcat 10.1.0 to 10.1.0-M12, 10.0.0-M1 to 10.0.18, 9.0.0-M1 to 9.0.60 and 8.5.0 to 8.5.77 that could cause client connections to share an Http11Processor instance resulting in responses, or part responses, to be received by the wrong client.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:apache:tomcat:10.1.0:milestone3:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:apache:tomcat:10.1.0:milestone4:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:apache:tomcat:10.1.0:milestone5:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:apache:tomcat:10.1.0:milestone1:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:apache:tomcat:10.1.0:milestone2:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:apache:tomcat:10.1.0:milestone7:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:apache:tomcat:10.1.0:milestone8:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:apache:tomcat:10.1.0:milestone9:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:apache:tomcat:10.1.0:milestone6:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:apache:tomcat:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:apache:tomcat:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:apache:tomcat:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:apache:tomcat:10.1.0:milestone10:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:apache:tomcat:10.1.0:milestone11:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:apache:tomcat:10.1.0:milestone12:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:debian:debian_linux:10.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:debian:debian_linux:11.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')]
